notesForValidator: Extracted session-next similarity logic into edison.core.task.similarity (deterministic Jaccard + optional shingles, config-driven). Added `edison task similar` CLI for project-wide duplicate detection (global + session-scoped tasks). Session next now calls the shared index and still emits the same minimal `similar` shape. Added tasks.similarity config + TaskConfig accessors. Fixed incorrect get_data_path fallback usage in TaskRepository/QARepository. Updated/added tests and ran targeted e2e/session-next + CLI subprocess suites.
